A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film requires an open mind from Star Wars fans. It's an original take on the Star Wars franchise and one that took me two viewings to really appreciate. With small issues that could have been refined\, this film overall is a great inclusion to the franchise. It expands the lore that has entertained audiences for decades and does well to surprise its fan base\, but none the less is an extremely entertaining film\, providing the fun and nostalgic feel that warms the heart of so many Star Wars fans.
